verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings,<s%> he <S%G3332>departed<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan;<s%>
And <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him; and he <S%G2323>healed<s%> them <S%G1563>there.<s%>

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, <S%G3985>tempting<s%> him, and <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G156>cause?<s%>

And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Have you not <S%G314>read,<s%> that he <S%G3588>which<s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> them <S%G730>male<s%> and female, <S%G2338><s%>

And <S%G2036>said,<s%> For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G1752>cause<s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and shall <S%G4347>join<s%> to his <S%G1135>wife:<s%> and they <S%G1417>two<s%> shall be <S%G3391>one<s%> flesh? <S%G4561><s%>

<S%G5620>Why<s%> they are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> but <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4801>joined<s%> <S%G4801>together,<s%> let not <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5563>put<s%> asunder. <S%G5563><s%>

They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G5101>Why<s%> did <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1781>command<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> a <S%G975>writing<s%> of <S%G647>divorce,<s%> and to <S%G630>put<s%> her <S%G630>away?<s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4314>because<s%> of the <S%G4641>hardness<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4641>hearts<s%> <S%G2010>suffered<s%> you to <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1135>wives:<s%> but from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> it was not so. <S%G3779><s%>

And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> except <S%G1508><s%> it be for <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> and shall <S%G1060>marry<s%> <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G3429>commits<s%> <S%G3429>adultery:<s%> and <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G1060>marries<s%> her <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> does <S%G3429>commit<s%> adultery. <S%G3429><s%>

His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G156>case<s%> of the <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G3779>so<s%> with his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> it is not <S%G4851>good<s%> to <S%G1060>marry.<s%>

But he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, All <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G5562>receive<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> save <S%G235><s%> they to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is given. <S%G1325><s%>

For there are some <S%G2135>eunuchs,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> were <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1080>born<s%> from their <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb:<s%> and there are some <S%G2134>eunuchs,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> were <S%G2134>made<s%> <S%G2134>eunuchs<s%> of <S%G444>men:<s%> and there be <S%G2135>eunuchs,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G2134>made<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2134>eunuchs<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven's<s%> sake. He that is <S%G1410>able<s%> to receive <S%G5562><s%> it, let him receive <S%G5562><s%> it.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> were there <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him <S%G3813>little<s%> <S%G3813>children,<s%> that he should <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> them, and <S%G4336>pray:<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> them.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G863>Suffer<s%> <S%G3813>little<s%> <S%G3813>children,<s%> and <S%G2967>forbid<s%> them not, to <S%G2064>come<s%> to me: for of <S%G5108>such<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
And he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> them, and <S%G4198>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> thing shall I <S%G4160>do,<s%> that I may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3004>call<s%> you me good? <S%G18><s%> there is <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> but one, <S%G1520><s%> that is, <S%G2316>God:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the commandments. <S%G1785><s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4169>Which?<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> You shall do <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5407>murder,<s%> You shall not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> You shall not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> You shall not <S%G5576>bear<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> witness, <S%G5576><s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and your <S%G3384>mother:<s%> and, You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>

The <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things have I <S%G5442>kept<s%> from my <S%G3503>youth<s%> up: <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5302>lack<s%> I <S%G2089>yet?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G2309>will<s%> be <S%G5046>perfect,<s%> go <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G4453>sell<s%> that you <S%G5224>have,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and come <S%G1204><s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> me.

But when the <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful:<s%> for he <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2933>possessions.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> shall <S%G1423>hardly<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G3825>again<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, It is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5169>eye<s%> of a <S%G4476>needle,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

When his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G1605>amazed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved?<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>beheld<s%> them, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, With <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G102>impossible;<s%> but with <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are possible. <S%G1415><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we have <S%G863>forsaken<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> you; <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G1510>have<s%> <S%G686>therefore?<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That you <S%G3588>which<s%> have <S%G190>followed<s%> me, in the <S%G3824>regeneration<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2523>sit<s%> in the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> shall <S%G2523>sit<s%> on <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> <S%G2919>judging<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> one that has <S%G863>forsaken<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sisters,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G68>lands,<s%> for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> <S%G1752>sake,<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> an hundred <S%G1542>times,<s%> and shall <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
But many <S%G4183><s%> that are <S%G4413>first<s%> shall be <S%G2078>last;<s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be first. <S%G4413><s%>
